task.title: Registering for a Conference Style Event
task.abstract: Both authenticated and unauthenticated users can register for an event, view additional details, and select sessions in the Community Portal.

ul.li: Ensure the Status picklist is set to Active and the Is Published checkbox is enabled on the Event record
Authenticated users should log in to their Community Portal

step.cmd: Click on Events in the top navbar to search for events.
Click on the desired event to navigate to the Event Detail page and then click the Register Now button to continue to the Event Registration page.
Click Yourself or Someone Else in the pop-up modal depending on who is attending the event.
step.info: If, for example, an organization's HR representative is registering the CEO for an event, then the HR rep will click the Someone Else button.

step.cmd: Select the ticket type and click Continue.
step.info: Unauthenticated users must enter First Name, Last Name, and Email.

step.cmd: Use the sidebar nav to view additional event details and the Agenda Builder to select any available sessions and click Continue.
Click the Checkout button in the pop-up modal.
step.info: The Add Guests button is designed for users interested in Group Registration.

step.cmd: Registration information will autopopulate from the Contact record for authenticated portal users.
step.info: An unauthenticated portal user is directed to checkout as a guest and enter the required contact information to complete the registration.

step.cmd: Select the Payment Method, enter the required information, and click the Pay button.

taskbody.result: A receipt is returned along with an email enclosed with the option for registrants to further customize their event experience via the Agenda Builder.
